query.question: Can I start accepting payments on my site while my Wix Payments account is still under verification?
query.answer: You can start accepting payments on your site using [Wix Payments](https://support.wix.com/en/article/about-wix-payments) almost immediately. However, we need to verify your identity before your account can be fully activated.

results.answer: Yes, you can start accepting payments on your site while your Wix Payments account is still under verification. Once you have connected Wix Payments to your site and started accepting payments, customers can complete their purchases. However, during the verification process, you will not be able to receive payouts to your bank account until the verification is fully completed and your account becomes active. The verification process typically takes up to 7 business days and requires you to submit identity and business information, including documents such as a government-issued photo ID and a bank statement. Importantly, you have 30 days from the first transaction to complete your account setup and verification; otherwise, your account will be suspended and you will no longer be able to accept payments through Wix Payments. Therefore, while verification is pending, accepting payments is possible but receiving payouts is paused until verification is successful.

misc_response.original_query: Can I start accepting payments on my site while my Wix Payments account is still under verification?

queries: accept payments while Wix Payments account under verification

misc_response.aggregation_answer: You can accept payments through your Wix Payments account even if your account is still under verification, but you won't be able to receive payouts until verification is complete. The verification process can take up to 7 business days, and you have 30 days from your first transaction to complete the verification to avoid suspension of your account.
misc_response.final_answer: Yes, you can start accepting payments on your site while your Wix Payments account is still under verification. Once you have connected Wix Payments to your site and started accepting payments, customers can complete their purchases. However, during the verification process, you will not be able to receive payouts to your bank account until the verification is fully completed and your account becomes active. The verification process typically takes up to 7 business days and requires you to submit identity and business information, including documents such as a government-issued photo ID and a bank statement. Importantly, you have 30 days from the first transaction to complete your account setup and verification; otherwise, your account will be suspended and you will no longer be able to accept payments through Wix Payments. Therefore, while verification is pending, accepting payments is possible but receiving payouts is paused until verification is successful.
